events.text:
Hey.
your alive, that's pretty cool.

right. There's this island thats next to the main city.
and in that island there's a [color=#FFF200]Soul Shard[/color]
and the huntsman wants this [color=#FFF200]Soul Shard[/color]
right.. and why does he need it?
I don't know, I think it's something to do with his lamp but I could be mistaken
and so.. why do I have to get it and not him?

I don't know, ask him.
anyways, how did meeting claire go?

well I am alive and in one piece..
so I say It went pretty well.
still a bit.. terrified of her but hey.

anyways.
about that huntsman guy
he seems a bit.. weird.

bit weird?
like how? what's so weird about him?

I don't know, just the feeling I guess
just something about him.. feels.... strange

I mean yeah I guess his "motive"
is that the right word?
yeah.. he's "motive" is a bit strange but I wouldn't worry about it too much
anyways, the train is right there. so I'll see you in the city.
ok I'll see you see there.
